attributes.action: Stop Health Reforms from destroying the NHS
attributes.additional_details:
The planned reforms are misguided and out of touch with the reality of delivering a sustainable NHS, free for all and of a consistent and high standard. While changes are no doubt needed to improve efficiency and reduce wastage of resources, I fail to see how this major reorganisation aiming to encourage competition with the private sector has quality of services and equality at its core.
The Government should abandon the current Bill
and instead listen to those professionals dedicated to delivering health care to the UK population for guidance on how to proceed with reform.
